message: I propose dividing the money with a 70-30 split in favor of Alice. This offers a fair distribution considering the potential risk of inflation.
I propose a 60-40 split in my favor.  While I acknowledge the risk of inflation, I believe this offer is fair considering the potential for higher gains in the future.
Considering the inflation, I propose an equal division of the funds. This ensures both of us receive a fair share without risking more than necessary.
